name: Mask of the One-Horned
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  In the lost songs of the oni nursemaids, Torachiyo was an elegant young man,strong of body and fair of face. He was once a beloved lieutenant of theShogun, and he followed her into the dark abyssal realms to repel the defiledones, winning renown for the oni, whose blood thinned with each passing day.  None now sing these songs, but the mask of a horned oni, even in a differentform, still possesses power beyond the norm.
